* has no limbs.
* has a [serpent body](/wiki/Slithy "Slithy").
* has a [thick hide](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned").
* is [acidic](/wiki/Acidic "Acidic") to eat.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"). |                                                              |

| A white naga:* cannot pick up items.
* has no limbs.
* has a [serpent body](/wiki/Slithy "Slithy").
* has a [thick hide](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned").
* can [lay eggs](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous").
* is [acidic](/wiki/Acidic "Acidic") to eat.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* may appear in [Sheol](/wiki/Sheol "Sheol"). |                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [\[2\]](#cite_note-2)                                                                            |

The **white naga** and **white naga hatchling** are members of the [naga](/wiki/Naga "Naga") monster class, added in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"). They resist [cold](/wiki/Cold "Cold") and [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") damage, and their corpses convey the same resistances. The adult form has a cold-based spit attack.

Adult white nagas may be found randomly generated only in the ice-themed [Sheol](/wiki/Sheol "Sheol") branch. Hatchlings [can appear on aligned levels](/wiki/Monster_frequency#Adjustment_for_aligned_levels_and_branches "Monster frequency"), as other baby monsters do, and can be hatched from eggs, however.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"Is adult spit attack defective?"*

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/monst.c in UnNetHack revision 1986, line 1887](http://sourceforge.net/p/unnethack/code/1986/tree/trunk/src/monst.c#l1887)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/monst.c in UnNetHack revision 1986, line 1927](http://sourceforge.net/p/unnethack/code/1986/tree/trunk/src/monst.c#l1927)
html:
White naga

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
N white naga hatchling (No tile)
Attacks Bite 1d4 physical
N white naga hatchling (No tile)
Attacks

Bite 1d4 physical

Base level 3

Speed 10
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 500
Nutritional value 100
Size large
Resistances cold, poison
Resistances conveyed cold, poison

A white naga hatchling:

  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • has a serpent body.
  • has a thick hide.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is strong.
Reference [1]
N white naga (No tile)
Attacks Bite 2d6 physical, Spit 0d0 cold
N white naga (No tile)
Attacks

Bite 2d6 physical, Spit 0d0 cold

Base level 13

Speed 14
Base AC 2
Base MR 40
Alignment 5 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 2600
Nutritional value 400
Size huge
Resistances cold, poison
Resistances conveyed cold, poison

A white naga:

  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • has a serpent body.
  • has a thick hide.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is acidic to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is strong.
  • may appear in Sheol.
Reference [2]

The white naga and white naga hatchling are members of the naga monster class, added in UnNetHack. They resist cold and poison damage, and their corpses convey the same resistances. The adult form has a cold-based spit attack.

Adult white nagas may be found randomly generated only in the ice-themed Sheol branch. Hatchlings can appear on aligned levels, as other baby monsters do, and can be hatched from eggs, however.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"Is adult spit attack defective?"

  1. ↑ src/monst.c in UnNetHack revision 1986, line 1887
  2. ↑ src/monst.c in UnNetHack revision 1986, line 1927

The '''white naga''' and '''white naga hatchling''' are members of the [[naga]] monster class, added in [[UnNetHack]]. They resist [[cold]] and [[poison]] damage, and their corpses convey the same resistances. The adult form has a cold-based spit attack.

Adult white nagas may be found randomly generated only in the ice-themed [[Sheol]] branch. Hatchlings [[Monster frequency#Adjustment for aligned levels and branches|can appear on aligned levels]], as other baby monsters do, and can be hatched from eggs, however.

{{todo|Is adult spit attack defective?}}
